data.description: We create data products for more effective decision-making at the intersection of social science, data science, and software development.

data.summary:
I'm Johannes, and I enable social and public sector organizations to use data-driven and evidence-based decision-making.

Nine years ago, I founded the non-profit organization CorrelAid, where we support other NPOs with the help of over 2000 volunteer data scientists. Three years ago, I co-founded &effect, a software company that develops data products for the social and public sector.

On the technical side, we are currently developing a product at &effect to structure text data context-specifically using ontologies and LLMs and make it usable for decision-making processes.

I am convinced that in order to promote the common good use of data, we must support existing public-benefit-organizations to leverage their data. I am happy to connect to talk about everything from social entrepreneurship, data infrastructure, and social data science to natural language processing.

1648 Factory is a global venture studio launching the startups of tomorrow. We strive to build products and businesses that create real change and make a positive impact on the world.

In addition to building our own ventures, we empower our partners to do the same. We work closely with Founders, Startups and Fortune 500 companies who need support in building better products & product teams.

We’re building what matters, together.

urn:li:fs_normalized_company:101268323.description:
At 1648 Studio, we employ thoughtful design and marketing to transform ideas into products and convey their value.

Our range of services has evolved while supporting product teams and consultancies, helping companies transition from their initial concept to their first sale. We provide all the necessary expertise and tools for successful market entry, assisting you from initial research and strategy to branding, prototyping, development, and market launch. We offer:

- Idea Exploration, Discovery and Prototyping
- Product Design
- Website Page Creation
- Presentation Design
- Marketing Campaign Development
- Graphic and Motion Design

We're here to assist. We aim to meet you where you are, offering the transparency and collaboration you require. If you like to be deeply involved, great; join our Slack and Figma. We welcome your feedback. If you're new to working with creatives, outline your goals, and we'll use our experience and common sense to get you there.

We are a multidisciplinary team of ten: Graphics, Motion, Product Designers, Web Developers, and Marketers. As a remote-first company, we're distributed across Germany, Ukraine, Netherlands, and Bulgaria.

As a part of the 1648 Group, over the last three years, we have helped shape and support eleven ventures in our portfolio (collectively valued at ~88M) and delivered over 30 projects for our clients.

We invite you to connect or message us; we'd be happy to learn about you and see how we can help.

publications.name: Welcome, Computer! How Do Participants Introduce a Collaborative Application During Face-to-Face Interaction?
publications.publisher: International Conference on Human-Computer Interaction – INTERACT 2019, Springer
publications.description: During cooperative interaction, participants introduce materials, artefacts, and other individuals into the ongoing interaction. Depending on how this introduction unfolds, the participants may embrace the new element in an easy way or not. If the new element is a collaborative application of interactive software designed to support the interaction, it may or may not improve the collaboration because of how it was introduced. Therefore, understanding and designing the initial interaction is key for unleashing the positive impact of collaborative systems.

projects.description:
Silberdraht ist ein kostenloser Telefondienst, der den Zugriff auf digitale Inhalte ohne Internetverbindung erlaubt. Wir bieten Senior:innen Information & Unterhaltung aus dem Internet über den Telefonweg. Silberdraht schließt die Lücke zwischen der analogen und digitalen Welt. Damit ermöglichen wir der Generation 65+ einen unkomplizierten Zugriff auf das Internet.

Silberdraht sieht sich als neues Kommunikationsmedium neben TV, Radio & Internet. Wir schaffen ein analoges, zusätzliches Angebot das während der Coronakrise und darüber hinaus Mehrwert für die Generation 65+ unseres Landes bietet.

Die abhörbaren Inhalte – die sonst nur digital abrufbar wären – sind informativ und unterhaltsam. Silberdraht bietet neben aktuellen, national-kuratierten und regionalen Nachrichten auch Wetterinformationen, geistliche Ansprachen und Unterhaltungsprogramme wie Hörspiele und Kunstbeiträge (Musik, Kultur, Kabarett) an.
projects.title: Silberdraht

publications.name: Sampled Policy Gradient for Learning to Play the Game Agar.io
publications.description: In this paper, a new offline actor-critic learning algorithm is introduced: Sampled Policy Gradient (SPG). SPG samples in the action space to calculate an approximated policy gradient by using the critic to evaluate the samples. This sampling allows SPG to search the action-Q-value space more globally than deterministic policy gradient (DPG), enabling it to theoretically avoid more local optima. SPG is compared to Q-learning and the actor-critic algorithms CACLA and DPG in a pellet collection task and a self play environment in the game Agar.io. The online game Agar.io has become massively popular on the internet due to intuitive game design and the ability to instantly compete against players around the world. From the point of view of artificial intelligence this game is also very intriguing: The game has a continuous input and action space and allows to have diverse agents with complex strategies compete against each other. The experimental results show that Q-Learning and CACLA outperform a pre-programmed greedy bot in the pellet collection task, but all algorithms fail to outperform this bot in a fighting scenario. The SPG algorithm is analyzed to have great extendability through offline exploration and it matches DPG in performance even in its basic form without extensive sampling.

publications.name: Deep Reinforcement Learning for Pellet Eating in Agar. io
publications.description: The online game Agar.io has become massively popular on the internet due to its intuitive game design and its ability to instantly match players with others around the world.  The game has a continuous input and action space and allows diverse agents with complex strategies to compete against each other. In this paper, we focus on the pellet eating task in the game, in which an agent has to learn to optimize its navigation strategy to grow maximally in size within a specific time period.  This work first investigates how different state representations affect the learning process of a Q-learning algorithm combined with artificial neural networks which are used for representing the Q-function. The representations examined range from raw pixel values to extracted handcrafted feature vision grids.  Secondly, the effects of using different resolutions for the representations are examined.  Finally, we compare the performance of different value function network architectures.  The architectures examined are two convolutional Deep Q-networks (DQN) of varying depth and one multilayer perceptron.  The results show that the use of handcrafted feature vision grids significantly outperforms the direct use of raw pixel input. Furthermore, lower resolutions of 42×42 lead to better performances than larger resolutions of 84×84.

data.name: admi
data.tagline: Partner der kommunalen Energiewende

localized.en_US: Partner der kommunalen Energiewende

data.description:
admi Kommunal GmbH - Gemeinsam mit Städten und Gemeinden treiben wir die kommunale Energiewende voran. 

Wir unterstützen Kommunen bei der Planung und Umsetzung ihrer energiepolitischen Ambitionen kompetent und zielgerichtet. Damit beschleunigen wir u.a. den Photovoltaikausbau auf kommunalen Liegenschaften. Dank unserer technologiegetriebenen Herangehensweise, Prozessexzellenz und Erfahrung in der Zusammenarbeit mit staatlichen Institutionen, bringen wir Kommunen innerhalb weniger Wochen ihrer autonomen Energieversorgung und CO2-Neutralität näher. Davon profitiert langfristig nicht nur der Klimaschutz, sondern auch alle Steuerzahler. Dabei agieren wir als echte Partner der modernen, effektiven Verwaltung in Deutschland.

Mit hunderten von erfolgreich realisierten Projekten haben wir uns schon nach wenigen Monaten erfolgreich am Markt etabliert und dabei tausende Tonnen CO2 eingespart. 

Aber die Zeit rennt: Heute entfallen noch rund 38% aller CO2-Emissionen in Deutschland auf die Kommunen. Gleichzeitig verpflichtet die Europäische Union ihre Mitgliedsstaaten, alle geeigneten öffentlichen Dächer bis 2030 mit Photovoltaik auszustatten, um die Klimaneutralität voranzutreiben. Dieses Ziel können wir nur erreichen, wenn wir in den nächsten Jahren weiter so viele Kommunen wie möglich auf dem Weg in die komplette Klimaneutralität unterstützen. Und dafür brauchen wir Dich!

Wenn Du uns auf unserer Mission mit Deinem Talent, deiner Passion und Deiner Tatkraft unterstützen möchtest, freuen wir uns auf Deine Bewerbung. 

Schau gerne auf unserer Karriereseite vorbei, hier findest Du immer alle aktuellen Stellenangebote.

localized.en_US: We make audio accessible.
localized.nl_NL: Spraak naar tekst services voor elke situatie!

data.description:
“We value taking ownership and setting ourselves ambitious goals while staying genuine and delighting customers.”

We are Amberscript, a dynamic startup with the goal of making audio accessible by transforming it into text. With the best speech-recognition algorithms on the market, we save our customers hundreds of thousands of hours of manual labor and we enable thousands of people with auditory impairments (deaf and hard of hearing) to understand video and audio more easily.

We are in the process of disrupting a very traditional market (transcription & subtitling). Now that we have achieved product-market fit, we are scaling rapidly. Our AI speech-to-text engine obtains the best results in the market, as proven by independent tests in the media. Our product is being used by 1.5 million+ users worldwide.

data.name: Ankaadia
data.tagline: Wir organisieren Integration für internationale Pflegefachkräfte

localized.en_US: Wir organisieren Integration für internationale Pflegefachkräfte
localized.de_DE: Wir digitalisieren und automatisieren die Anwerbung, Anerkennung und Integration von internationalen Fachkräften

data.description:
Wir sind Ihr Technologiepartner für die Digitalisierung des Anwerbe-, Berufsanerkennungs- und Integrationsprozesses von internationalen Fachkräften für das europäische Gesundheitswesen und die Industrie.

Ankaadia ist eine hochmoderne SaaS-Applikation („Software-as-a-Service“), die speziell für die Bedürfnisse von Personalserviceagenturen, Arbeitgebern aus dem Gesundheitswesen und der Industrie sowie internationalen Fachkräften entwickelt wurde, um für alle Beteiligten höchste Transparenz und Effizienz im Anwerbe-, Anerkennungs- und Integrationsprozess zu gewährleisten.

Ankaadia automatisiert und digitalisiert Ihre Arbeitsprozesse in einem hohen Maße, sodass sich Ihr Team deutlich weniger mit „Verwaltung“ beschäftigen muss. Dadurch bleibt viel mehr Zeit, sich um die Qualität der Rekrutierung und die internationalen Fachkräfte selbst zu kümmern.

Die Plattform ist Cloud-basiert und gewährt höchsten Datenschutz
entsprechend den EU-Vorschriften (DSGVO). Es wird sichergestellt, dass benötigte Dokumente und Informationen sach- und zeitgerecht für die jeweiligen Adressaten digital zur Verfügung stehen und dass die notwendigen Prozessschritte und das Projektcontrolling größtmöglich automatisiert sind.

projects.description:
Der Kunde
PIONIERKRAFT GmbH ist ein stark wachsendes Start-up. PIONIERKRAFT vertreibt, plant und realisiert Photovoltaik-Lösungen in kleinen Mehrfamilienhäusern und bietet eine Alternative zu heutigen Mieterstromkonzepten an.
 	
Die Herausforderung
Finanzielle und bürokratische Barrieren sorgen dafür, dass weniger als 1 % der Mieterstrom Projekte in Deutschland realisiert werden. PIONIERKRAFT produziert daher eine innovative Hardware, um die Verteilung von grünem Photovoltaikstrom innerhalb eines Mehrfamilienhauses zu ermöglichen.
Neben der Hardware sind aber auch einige softwarebasierte Dienstleistungen nötig, um die Mieterstromprojekte erfolgreich durchführen zu können. Mit der Entwicklung der softwarebasierten Lösungen auf Basis von React und der Google Cloud Plattform wurde 2020 Appdafür beauftragt.

Die Lösung
Die von uns neu entwickelte PIONIERKRAFT-Plattform bietet sowohl den Vermieter:innen (Stromverkauf) als auch den Mieter:innen (Stromabnahme) die Möglichkeit einfach und digital ihre Stromlieferverträge zu verwalten. In Echtzeit können zudem in einem grafischen Dashboard die aktuellen Stromflüsse eingesehen werden.

Die Ergebnisse
Zusammen mit PIONIERKRAFT haben wir ein vollumfängliches Nutzerportal entwickelt, um Mieterstrom endlich einfach verwalten zu können.
Im Zentrum der Entwicklung stand der Fokus auf eine einfache und klare Nutzerführung, sowohl für die Vermieter:innen als auch den Mieter:innen. Dies ist uns durch einen nutzerzentrierten Entwicklungsprozess und eine iterative Vorgehensweise gelungen.

Technische Umsetzung
React, Firebase, Google Cloud Plattform, AWS IoT Core, Influx DB, MQTT, TypeScript, Stripe, Mobile, Desktop,
projects.title: Mieterstrom - Aber einfach | Entwicklung des PIONIERKRAFT-Portals

data.tagline: Thermal Intelligence for a Sustainable Earth

localized.en_US: Thermal Intelligence for a Sustainable Earth

data.description: OroraTech is a thermal data intelligence company headquartered in Munich, Germany, with the mission to create truth for a net-zero economy and protect our environment. Their leading Wildfire Solution is used by clients all over the globe, monitoring more than 160 million ha of forest. The service will be complemented by multipurpose thermal-infrared sensing nanosatellites with in-space artificial intelligence to improve real-time response and to improve continuous coverage. The first of its kind satellite was successfully launched in January 2022 and will be expanded to a fleet of 100 satellites over the following years. Founded in 2018, the company has grown to an international team of over 80 employees supported by private and institutional investors, the European Space Agency, and the governments of Germany and Bavaria.

publications.name: Advances in the Development of the Attitude Determination and Control System of the CubeSat MOVE-II
publications.publisher: 7TH EUROPEAN CONFERENCE FOR AERONAUTICS AND AEROSPACE SCIENCES (EUCASS), At Milan
publications.description:
D. Messmann, T. Gruebler, F. Coelho, T. Ohlenforst, J. van Bruegge,F. Mauracher, M. Doetterl, S. Plamauer, P. Schnierle, T. Kale, M. Seifert, A. Fuhrmann,E. Karagiannis, A. Ulanowski, T. Lausenhammer1, A. Meraner1, M. Langer
(LinkedIn has a limit on the number of authors..., the conference didn't)

Advances in the Development of the Attitude Determination and Control System of the CubeSat MOVE-II. 
MOVE-II (Munich Orbital Verification Experiment) will be the first CubeSat of the Technical University of Munich (TUM) utilizing a magnetorquer-based active attitude determination and control system (ADCS). The ADCS consists of six circuit boards (five satellite side panels and one central circuit board in satellite stack), each equipped with a microcontroller, sensors and an integrated coil. The design enables redundancy and therefore forms a fault-tolerant system with respect to sensors and actuators. The paper describes the hardware implementation, algorithms, software architecture, and first test results of the integrated ADCS on the engineering unit. A possibility to upgrade and extend our software after launch will enable further research on new and innovative attitude determination and control strategies and distributed computation on satellites. The MOVE-II flight unit is in the integration and test phase with an intended launch date in early 2018.

projects.description: This thesis is based upon an evolvement of the MOVE-II CubeSat sidepanel technology. To incorporate additional functionality, I developed a sidepanel prototype for satellites that includes a decentralised power system. Each panel generates energy using solar cells, charges its own batteries, distributes excess power to charge other panels and feeds a common power bus connected to other subsystems and the payload. This approach minimises bus volume and mass, increases reliability and allows easier scaling to different spacecraft sizes compared with traditional architectures. A prototype was verified on a high altitude balloon and in lab experiments.
projects.title: Master's Thesis - Highly Integrated Smart Satellite Panels for Commercial Space Applications

projects.description:
Sensors based on Fiber Bragg Gratings (FBGs) can offer many benefits for measuring strain or temperatures in harsh environments. For the application of such sensors, there is a demand for cost-efficient solutions to capture the reflected spectrum of the FBGs.
The aim of this bachelor thesis is to develop and implement a system to query the reflection spectra of one or more FBGs by using an additional FBG, applying strain on it by means of an optomechatronic assembly and bringing it into correlation with the FBGs to measure. This work concentrates on the control of the mechanics, the detection of the reflected light intensity and the data analysis.
projects.title: Bsc Thesis - Development and Implementation of a Fiber Bragg Grating Measurement System based on an Optomechatronically Tunable Fiber Bragg Grating

projects.description:
The challenge of this diploma thesis was to develop a digital 3D compass based on Infineon Technologies hall-sensors.
For this application the magnetic fields in X, Y and Z direction are each measured by a sensor. A 3D acceleration sensor detects (by measuring the earth gravity) the current tilt. Using both the values of the field and the acceleration sensors, a two-dimensional projection of a virtual compass needle is generated and showed on the display.
The thesis mainly consists of the electrical design including component selection, the development of the software and the construction of six end products for marketing.
The biggest challenge of the project was to filter and correct the output values of the hall sensors. The used hall-sensors are originally not developed for detecting low fields. The used type is currently used in the accelerator pedal, the throttle valve or the height regulation of Xenon headlamps in cars and withstands a temperature range from -40 bis 170◦ C.
The goal is to proof that today’s automotive hall-sensor technology by Infineon is ready to measure low fields, even if it is not originally developed for this application.
projects.title: Digital 3D Compass

data.description:
Simple processes and fast customer onboarding!

AUTHADA offers digital identification and signature solutions. With AUTHADA ident, customers identify themselves in seconds thanks to smartphone and ID card - uncomplicated, legally compliant and efficient. Either 24/7 online or on-site at the POS with AUTHADA onsite. From the conclusion of a credit or cell phone contract to the opening of an account. And that - if desired - including a Qualified Electronic Signature (QES), which replaces the handwritten signature even on a regulatory level. With our solutions, contracts can be concluded digitally and in compliance with the law from any location and at any time - whether on the couch at 11 p.m. on a Sunday, in the morning shortly before 6 a.m. on the train, or even on the beach on vacation.  

As a certified identification provider, we stand for secure transactions and protection of data and identities. With our ISO27001 and BSI certification as well as our state-of-the-art encryption and our highly secure data center, we ensure the highest level of security in identification services. Of course, all AUTHADA solutions are AML-, and eIDAS-compliant and thus meet all KYC requirements. 

We also offer our solutions to our enterprise customers in the form of so-called "Software Development Kits" (SDK). This means that they can be fully implemented in the processes and provided with their own branding.  

We also offer our solutions to our enterprise customers in the form of so-called "Software Development Kits" (SDK). This means that they can be fully implemented in the processes and provided with their own branding.

data.description:
BABLE Smart Cities is Europe’s leading Public Sector Innovation Accelerator, empowering cities, regions and towns to implement smarter and climate-neutral urban solutions. Born from the need to streamline public sector innovation, we bring years of expertise and a deep understanding of the challenges facing modern cities.

Our mission is to accelerate change by providing the tools to plan, fund, upskill, procure, and disseminate innovative solutions 50% faster and more cost-effectively. With over €2 billion in Smart City projects facilitated, we help public sector bodies drive impactful urban development, ensuring faster implementation and measurable results.

With 6+ regional offices across Europe, we combine local knowledge with global best practices to implement more projects faster. Join us on the journey to a better urban life!

It takes a holistic approach to urban collaboration, touching on subject matters around a vast array of topics. It aims to bring perspective and personal connection to the field while informing and inspiring action and partnerships.

data.summary:
I am the Founder and CEO of BABLE Smart Cities, where we lead the charge in collaborating with local governments and industry leaders to drive transformative projects in urban mobility and Smart City solutions. My work is centered around connecting public and private entities, leveraging a deep understanding of industrial, scientific, and governmental processes to create impactful partnerships that advance urban development.
With over a decade of experience, I specialise in implementing innovative technology projects that address the complex challenges of modern cities. From developing innovative business models for emerging digital markets to conducting in-depth system analyses, my focus is on fostering innovation and sustainability in urban environments.
At BABLE, we are passionate about creating cities that are more connected, efficient, and responsive to the needs of their citizens. I work closely with governments, institutions, and private partners to co-create scalable and sustainable solutions that truly make a difference.
Feel free to reach out if you’re interested in discussing potential collaborations or learning more about our work at BABLE!
data.headline: CEO/Founder at BABLE - innovation with cities and for cities

data.summary:
Ich bin seit über 13 Jahren ein Innovator, Unternehmer und Berater im Bereich der Smart-City-Strategien und -Technologien. Mein Ziel ist es, praktische Lösungen für komplexe urbane Herausforderungen zu entwickeln und diese mit Kunden und Partnern in skalierbare Projekte und Ventures zu übersetzen. Dabei lege ich Wert auf eine menschenzentrierte, nachhaltige und inklusive digitale Transformation.

Seit Februar 2021 leite ich das Daten-Kompetenzzentrum für Städte und Regionen DKSR in Berlin, das sich zum Ziel gesetzt hat, Städten und kommunalen Unternehmen eine Open-Source-Dateninfrastruktur und professionelle Datendienste anzubieten. Zuvor war ich als Leiter des Kompetenzteams "Urban Governance Innovation" am Fraunhofer IAO tätig, wo ich mich auf Innovationsmanagement für Smart Cities und auf urbane Daten-Governance spezialisiert habe. 

Im Rahmen der Fraunhofer "Morgenstadt Initiative" war ich verantwortlich für eine Innovationspartnerschaft zwischen 35 europäischen Städten, 42 privaten Unternehmen und 12 Forschungseinrichtungen, die urbane Innovationen vorangetrieben und die Umsetzung von nachhaltigen und vernetzten Lösungen für bessere Städte ermöglicht haben. Daraus sind Innovationsprojekte mit einem Gesamtvolumen von über 500 Millionen Euro entstanden. 

Neben der Gründung von DKSR war ich Mitgründer und CIO von BABLE. In den letzten 13 Jahren habe ich Städte wie Wien, Stockholm, Manchester, Eindhoven, Belfast, Zagreb, Porto, Köln, Berlin, Prag, Dublin, München sowie Landkreise und kleinere Kommunen bei der digitalen Transformation beraten.

Puts a people-centered, sustainable and inclusive local digital transition as a critical policy topic on the agenda of high-level political forums and mainstream people-centred digitalisation in global dialogues on smart cities and human rights.
 
Ensures that investment and financing are directed to people-centered smart cities to accelerate the achievement of the SDGs with a specific focus on developing countries, small and medium size cities and grassroots urban communities.

experience.description:
BABLE offers an exchange platform for the Smart City community and provides a digital toolkit to facilitate implementation of smart and sustainable solutions in cities. It enables innovative companies, public authorities, and experts to exchange information, ideas, products, services, and Use Cases as reference projects. 

The BABLE Platform provides neutrally described Smart City Solutions as blueprints and complementary services to its community. The platform provides transparency and matches the demand and supply side. The idea is to enhance economic potential, reduce costs and to open new business opportunities. Some of the features offered include: market consultation, technical expertise, innovative procurement, promotion mechanisms, building capacities and providing space for dialogue with other cities, companies, and research institutes.

publications.name: City Report “New York City”
publications.description: Between May 2012 and October 2013, 12 Fraunhofer Institutes conducted the project “Morgenstadt: City Insights“ with 30 industrial businesses and 6 cities, with the goal of creating an inventory of effective solutions for sustainable cities. To this end, a catalogue of inspiring cities around the world was created and the following six cities were selected for in-depth study: Freiburg, Berlin, Copenhagen, New York City, Singapore and Tokyo. A team of Fraunhofer researchers traveled to each of these cities to study trailblazing projects and to learn about innovative solutions by conducting interviews, engaging in discussions and visiting project sites. The goal was to investigate how these model projects were conceptualized, initiated and implemented, measure their achievements, and identify which actors and factors contributed to their overall success. Additionally, the goal was to determine under which conditions these solution approaches could be transferred to other cities.

data.summary:
I am Frank Müller, married and father of two wonderful daughters, a passionate IT expert and a visionary entrepreneur. 
I love and believe in freedom. That value is more than just a word to me. It is the result of a great awareness, a high responsibility and a solid foundation. My foundation is my faith in Jesus and his unconditional love for us. On this foundation I build my big visions, such as working for peace in the Holy Land. I am not afraid to produce creative and sometimes crazy ideas, such as a medium-sized company that is spread over four countries and cultures and offers its employees a lot of freedom. Founding a bootcamp academy in the middle of the Corona pandemic is certainly also one of them. With this, I create new innovations and added value for my customers and the people who are with me on the way. 
With more than 32 years of IT competence and 15 years as an entrepreneur, I am able to help other entrepreneurs to focus on their core business and to translate their requirements into technological possibilities and implementations. My team and I can translate these requirements into a customized IT strategy, processes and technologies. I always have a heart for the people I accompany. 

I want to encourage them to go new ways and to unfold their potentials. I am open for the exchange with people who do not regard values as CSR or marketing blabber, but as the basis of their actions. People who want to change the world positively. And of course, people who are looking for my or our support on the way to the cloud, the digitalization or the use of AI are also welcome :).

data.summary:
Willkommen auf meinem Profil! 
Als CEO der bamero AG darf ich namhafte Unternehmen, kommunale Verwaltungen und Ministerien bei der Gestaltung von digital unterstützten Arbeitswelten begleiten. 
Meine Passion: Die aktuellen Hypes der Digitalisierung zu entmystifizieren und Menschen beim täglichen Arbeiten wieder wichtige Lebenszeit zurückzugeben.

Unsere Mission der bamero:
Inspirierende Zielbilder in greifbare Strukturen und passende digitale Werkzeuge überführen und im Alltag verankern.

Warum?
Wir streben eine Welt voller «lebendiger» Organisationen an.

Eine Welt, in der Organisationen den Wandel aktiv gestalten.
Eine Welt, in der Organisationen die Arbeitswelten fortwährend verbessern.
Eine Welt, in der technologische Möglichkeiten menschliche Fähigkeiten bereichern.


_______
Meine Expertise
Mit über 15 Jahren Erfahrung bin ich Ihr Ansprechpartner für:
Prozessmanagement: Optimierung Ihrer Geschäftsabläufe für maximale Effizienz
Projektmanagement: Erfolgreiche Umsetzung komplexer Digitalisierungsvorhaben
Enterprise Architecture Management: Ganzheitliche Gestaltung Ihrer IT-Landschaft
Low-Code-Entwicklung: Schnelle und flexible Lösungen für Ihre individuellen Anforderungen
--
Spezialisierung auf öffentliche Verwaltung
Unsere Expertise erstreckt sich besonders auf den öffentlichen Sektor:
OZG-Umsetzung: Wir unterstützen Sie bei der Digitalisierung von Verwaltungsleistungen
E-Akte: Implementierung effizienter elektronischer Aktenführung
Verwaltungsdigitalisierung: Ganzheitliche Konzepte für die digitale Transformation Ihrer Behörde

_______
Lehrtätigkeiten
Meine Passion Wissen weiterzugeben lebe ich gerne als Dozent für Prozessmanagement, ERP-Systeme, IT-Architekturen, Verwaltungsdigitalisierung und andere Themen an unterschiedlichen Einrichtungen wie der HTWG Konstanz, DHBW, Hochschule Kehl oder privaten Lehreinrichtungen aus.

Lassen Sie uns gemeinsam Ihre digitale Zukunft gestalten
Ob Sie Ihre Prozesse optimieren, Ihre IT-Architektur modernisieren oder Ihre Verwaltung digitalisieren möchten – die bamero AG steht Ihnen als Partner zur Seite. 

Kontaktieren Sie mich für ein unverbindliches Gespräch über Ihre Herausforderungen und Ziele.

publications.name: Fallstudie: Stadt Konstanz: Smartes Modellieren von Geschäftsprozessen für Smart Cities
publications.description: Die Fallstudie zeigt, wie intuitiv zugängliche Modellierungssprachen und multimediale Annotation dazu beitragen, Expertenwissen strukturiert zu dokumentieren. Grundlage der Fallstudie ist ein Reengineering‐Projekt der Stadt Konstanz, in dessen Rahmen ein Parkraumkonzept erstellt wurde. Dabei konnten Fachanwender unter Einsatz einer agilen Vorgehensweise mit dieser Art der Prozessmodellierung zum Teil komplexe fachliche Sachverhalte selbst modellieren und dokumentieren. Den Anwendern wird hierbei ermöglicht, ohne detaillierte Kenntnis über die Modellierungssprache oder Modellierungstechniken eigene kreative Lösungen in das Geschäftsprozessmanagement einzubringen.

projects.description:
Gemeinsam mit der Hochschule Konstanz, der Universität Bayreuth und der Goethe-Universität Frankfurt am Main forscht die bamero als Experte für Technologie und Prozessmanagement die prozessbasierte Integration menschlicher Erwartungen in digitalisierten Arbeitswelten – kurz PRIME genannt. Dieses Projekt wird vom BMBF, den Europäischen Sozialfonds für Deutschland und der Europäischen Union unterstützt und gefördert.
Aufgabe der bamero ist es, die langjährigen Erfahrungen des agilen Prozessmanagements und der Prozessdigitalisierung um die Komponenten des Process Experience Engineering zu ergänzen.
Als Anwendungspartner des BMBF Projektes konnten langjährige Kunden der bamero gewonnen werden. Neben Partnern aus der Industrie wie der Exportverpackung Sehnde GmbH und der b.i.g. gruppe management gmbh, werden die Stadtverwaltungen Konstanz, Freiburg und auch Tengen unterschiedliche Anwendungsfälle dazu beisteuern.

Das Verbundprojekt „Prozessbasierte Integration menschlicher Erwartungen in digitalisierten Arbeitswelten – PRIME“, Fkz.: 02L18A043, wird im Rahmen des Programms "Zukunft der Arbeit" vom Bundesministerium für Bildung und Forschung und dem Europäischen Sozialfonds der Europäischen Union gefördert.
Zusammen.Zukunft.Gestalten.

publications.name: ESG-Berichtspflicht: Lästige Regulatorik oder eine Keimzelle für Innovation?
publications.publisher: Platform Industrie 4.0  /  Bundesministerium für Wirtschaft  und Klimaschutz (BMWK)
publications.description:
Mit dem neuen Whitepaper „ESG-Berichtspflicht: lästige Regulatorik oder eine Keimzelle für Innovation?“ möchten die Akteure der Plattform Industrie 4.0 Unternehmen eine Orientierung an die Hand geben. ESG steht dabei für Umwelt (Environment), Soziales (Social), Grundsätze der Unternehmensführung (Governance).

ESG-Berichte werden immer mehr zu einem wichtigen Kriterium des Risikomanagements bei Kapitalinvestments. Sie geben Anlegerinnen und Anlegern eine Momentaufnahme davon, wie es um die Auswirkungen des Unternehmens in den drei Bereichen bestellt ist.

Im Whitepaper erklären die Autorinnen und Autoren, dass es auch aus rechtlicher Sicht für Unternehmen wichtig ist, ESG-Informationen offenzulegen: Das Lieferkettengesetz verpflichtet Unternehmen zu verantwortungsvollem Handeln in den Bereichen Umwelt und Menschenrechte. Außerdem erklären die Autorinnen und Autoren, dass die ESG-Ansätze ein Innovationstreiber für Unternehmen sein können: Die erhobenen Daten und erworbenen Kompetenzen ermöglichen neue, profitable und zukunftsfähige digitale Geschäftsmodelle. Außerdem wird betont, dass eine Harmonisierung und Definition der vielfältigen Standards und Regulatorien angestrebt werden sollte. Nur so können die Marktakteure einen einheitlichen Handlungsrahmen vorfinden, was neue Kooperationen begünstigt.

member.occupation: Challenge The Status Quo & Get Things Done

publications.name: Digital Business Models as Drivers for Sustainability
publications.publisher: Gesellschaft für Internationale Zusammenarbeit (GIZ) GmbH  /  CCID  /  Platform Industrie 4.0
publications.description: The discussion paper investigates the emergence of digital business models from a sustainability perspective. The paper presents and analyses relevant up-to-date industry use cases in three categories from Europe and China. Many Industrie 4.0 technology opportunities are identified among these use cases. The insights and lessons drawn from the paper shall pave the foundation for further discussions on how digital business models support the sustainable transition of the industries.

member.occupation: Challenge The Status Quo & Get Things Done

publications.name: CTO/CDO Panel: Von Industrie 4.0 zur Digital Value Chain
publications.description:
So groß sie auch oft gedacht wird, so selten schafft es die konkrete Umsetzung der Digitalisierung der Industrie aktuell im Ergebnis über eine Steigerung von Effektivität und Verfügbarkeiten hinaus. Wann kommt die nahtlose Digitalisierung von der Kundenschnittstelle bis zur Lieferlogistik – oder gar darüber hinaus über den gesamten Lebenszyklus unserer Produkte? Welche neuen oder veränderten Geschäftsmodelle werden damit verbunden sein? Und welche Voraussetzungen müssen wir schaffen, um Herr oder Treiber dieser Veränderungen zu sein? In unserem CDO/CTO Panel werden wir das „WIE“ und „WAS“ hinter dem Weg zur Digital Industry diskutieren. Dabei geht es unter anderem um die Fragen: 
− Wie schaffen wir mittels Digitalisierung mehr als reine Effizienzsteigerung? 
− Ist eine durchgängige Digitalisierung von der Lieferanten- bis zur Kundenschnittstelle aktuell erreichbar? 
− Welche Möglichkeiten bieten Digitale-Erweiterungen, die Produkte über ihren gesamten Lebenszyklus begleiten? 
− Was können/müssen wir von B2C lernen, was ist nicht übertragbar? 
− Wie werden auf der Digital Value Chain die Wertschöpfungsanteile verteilt?

member.occupation: Challenge The Status Quo & Get Things Done

publications.name: Conference Speaker: Using data to optimize processes and quality in a intelligent way
publications.description: Companies gather a lot of data, but how can they use machine data in an intelligent way to raise efficiency and quality? Data should be used where it makes sense and in a smart way to open up new business models and improve the value for customers. In his presentation, Christian will show KrausMaffei’s approach of making sense of data from a strategic and practical point of view.

member.occupation: Challenge The Status Quo & Get Things Done

publications.name: Panel Diskussion: AI zwischen Technologie und Business. Was sind die Kosten eines Data Driven Unternehmens?
publications.description:
AI birgt für Unternehmen auf absehbare Zeit große Potenziale. Diverse Herausforderungen werden zukünftig mittels AI gelöst, der Mehrwert für das Business soll ein vielseitiger sein. Viele Services befinden sich indessen noch in den Anfängen, entwickeln sich aber immer schneller. In den kommenden Jahren sind in vielen Unternehmen erhebliche Investitionen in Artificial Intelligence zu erwarten.
Der Einsatz von AI hängt entscheidend von der Unternehmens-IT ab. Um die Potenziale neuer Technologien auszuschöpfen, die Fachabteilungen bei der Umsetzung einzelner Lösungen zu unterstützen und darüber hinaus eine zukunftsfähige Strategie mit Blick auf die Daten, die IT Infrastruktur und das effiziente Zusammenspiel sämtlicher Systeme zu schaffen, gilt es, Know-how auf mehreren Ebenen aufzubauen und die IT Strategie entsprechend anzupassen bzw. neu zu definieren.

member.occupation: Challenge The Status Quo & Get Things Done

publications.name: Conference Speaker: Daten smart nutzen, um neue Geschäftsmodelle zu generieren. Aber braucht es dafür eine AI Strategie?
publications.description: Ja, Unternehmen brauchen AI Anwendungen, aber braucht es dafür auch eine explizite AI Strategie? AI muss da eingesetzt werden, wo es Sinn macht und generierte Daten müssen smart genutzt werden, um so neue Geschäftsmodelle zu erschließen. Der Vortrag veranschaulicht, warum eine strategische Einbettung von AI Methoden nötig ist, stellt aber gleichzeitig die Frage, inwieweit eine konkrete AI Strategie erforderlich ist. Veranschaulicht wird dies abschließend anhand praktischer Beispiele.

data.description:
Wir, die Better Mobility, sind ein junges Team aus Verkehrsplanern, Produktvisionären, Kommunikationstalenten und Softwaregenies. Mit unserer multimodalen Mobilitätsplattform, dem 𝗠𝗼𝗯𝗶𝗹𝗶𝘁𝘆 𝗕𝗿𝗼𝗸𝗲𝗿, helfen wir Städten, Nahverkehrsanbietern und Unternehmen beim Aufbau eines vernetzten und nachhaltigen Mobilitätsangebotes. In unserem Unternehmen verbinden wir Historie mit Startup-Charakter: Entstanden aus einem Forschungsprojekt von regio iT und ASEAG im Jahr 2014 haben wir uns stark weiterentwickelt, ein attraktives Produktportfolio sowie ein großes Netzwerk aus Mobilitätspartnern aufgebaut. 
Das Bedürfnis nach individueller, kostengünstiger und nachhaltiger Mobilität wächst. Das bedeutet: Heute Car- oder Ride-Sharing, morgen Rad oder Scooter und übermorgen den Bus. Oder alles in Kombination? Es ist nicht länger der Besitz, sondern der einfache Zugang zu vielfältigen Mobilitätsmöglichkeiten, der wirklich zählt. Mit unseren Produkten wollen wir genau diesen ermöglichen und Mobilität in Städten regional und schlau vernetzen. 
 
Besuch uns auf www.bettermobility.de und lerne die multimodale Mobilitätsplattform für deine Stadt kennen!

Schaue auch hier vorbei: www.regioit.de,  www.aseag.de,  www.mova.de

data.summary:
Stell dir vor, deine After-Sales- und Servicetechniker könnten mehr Zeit vor Ort bei Kunden verbringen und weniger im Büro mit Papierkram und Excel-Listen. 

Du kämpfst ständig mit der Digitalisierung deiner Vertriebs- und Serviceformulare, findest keinen qualifizierten Nachwuchs, und dein Service-Team verliert den Überblick über Aufträge.

Du bist nicht allein.

Viele Unternehmen in der Industrie, Bau- und Fertigungsbranche stehen vor denselben Herausforderungen wie du. Doch es gibt eine Lösung: 

Ein maßgeschneiderter Workshop, der deine Prozesse optimiert und dir die nötigen digitalen Werkzeuge an die Hand gibt.

Seit über 10 Jahren sehe ich, wie Unternehmen wertvolle Zeit in Bürokratie und Arbeitsvorbereitung investieren, statt ihre eigentliche Arbeit zu erledigen. Mit meinem Team haben wir eine Methode entwickelt, die dir hilft, diese Zeit zurückzugewinnen.

Wir optimieren deine Prozesse und sparen über 60% der Administrationskosten ein – und das beweisen wir, bevor wir eine Zeile Code schreiben.

Beispielhafte Prozessoptimierungen:
- Digitalisierung von Aufmaßprozessen: Reduktion des Aufwands von durchschnittlich 76 Stunden pro Auftrag um 50 Stunden durch eine neue Softwarelösung.
- Entwicklung eines Systems zur Erstellung und Verwaltung von Formularen, direkt verknüpft mit Business-Prozessen.
- Strukturierte Erfassung und Bearbeitung von Vertriebsanfragen, die zuvor unstrukturiert per E-Mail, Fax oder Anruf eingingen.

Wenn du endlich den Überblick behalten und deine Projekte termingerecht abschließen willst, dann lass uns sprechen.

data.name: bitkasten GmbH
data.description:
bitkasten GmbH is a German software-as-a-service (SaaS) and clean-tech provider for the complete digitisation of mail communication and information exchange. The solution is the bitkasten, a digitalisation and communication platform - ecological, sustainable and smart. 

With the bitkasten, companies and municipalities bridge the ""last mile"" to the customer/citizen by digitising input and output processes. This is done without a costly IT project within a short time by using existing print data and postal addresses. This sustainable mail communication, digital and without printing & transport, leads to a cutting in half of printing, postage and process costs with ROI within a few weeks. With bitkasten, companies and government administrations communicate securely with their recipients - without email.

Documents are delivered to the digital, smart letterbox in a legally compliant manner. The bitkasten stands for fast communication like email, but without an email address, but secure and DSGVO-compliant. The identification and digital delivery of the communication will be based on the known postal address via the electronic ID card or identifier. 

For the recipient, communication in the bitkasten works without media disruption via app or web. The bitkasten receives mail digitally from all participating senders, provides the option of a digital signature and transmits data to ERP, CRM and HR systems or directly to specialised procedures in the municipal environment. By mapping processes, input options or forms in the closed system of the bitkasten, the recipient is securely connected to the company or the administration.

volunteer.role: Vorstand im AK Anwendung elektronischer Vertrauensdienste
volunteer.description:
Mit dem Inkrafttreten der Verordnung über elektronische Identifizierung und Vertrauensdienste für elektronische Transaktionen im Binnenmarkt der Europäischen Union (eIDAS) wurde die Basis für eine europaweite, rechtsgültige elektronische Kommunikation und sichere elektronische Identifizierung geschaffen. Mit Hilfe der Vertrauensdienste, wie elektronischen Signaturen, Siegeln, Zeitstempeln, Zustelldiensten und Zertifikaten zur Authentifizierung, können zukünftig Unternehmen, Verwaltungen und Privatpersonen digitale Dokumente wie Angebote, Bestellungen, Verträge u.v.m. innerhalb der Europäischen Union auf einer einheitlichen Rechtsbasis austauschen.

Mit dem in Kraft treten des eIDAS-Durchführungsgesetzes am 29. Juli 2017 wurde nicht nur das Signaturgesetz sowie die Signaturverordnung abgelöst, sondern auch neue Anwendungsmöglichkeiten in Deutschland, innerhalb und zwischen allen Ländern der Europäischen Union geschaffen.

BITKOM möchte Lösungen aufzeigen, wie die elektronischen Vertrauensdienste sinnvoll und wirtschaftlich in Unternehmen und Verwaltungen Verwendung finden können.

data.name: bitteiler
data.tagline: Unleash your IoT

localized.en_US: Unleash your IoT

data.description: bitteiler is a deep tech spin-off startup from TU Dresden that was founded in February 2023. We specialize in developing AI-aided compression software designed to significantly reduce the substantial volume of data generated by IoT sensors. Our innovative solution can achieve up to a 90% reduction in data size directly within the sensors before transmission. This results in cost savings for data transmission and storage. Moreover, bitteiler's technology also plays a crucial role in reducing energy consumption, making it a sustainable solution that supports industries in their digital transformation journey.

data.summary:
Hello there, I am the co-founder and chief executive of our start-up, bitteiler. I consider the chance of being able to turn our team's Ph.D. topics into an actual product that anybody can use one of the most fulfilling and challenging jobs that I ever did so far.

I personally have a background in both industry and academia. As a computer engineer, I consider myself a native developer, who has significant experience in C\C++. My previous projects encompassed Python, shader programming, and Assembly, as well. Also, I worked for various employers as a Web Designer, PHP-, Android- and .Net-Developer. As a researcher, I acquired my Ph.D. at the Technical University of Dresden where I focused on the application of network coding and IP header compression. I currently have over two dozen international peer-reviewed publications, most of which I had the chance to present at various scientific conferences all over the globe.

In my free time, I enjoy hanging out with my friends and the team doing nerdy things like board games and TTRPGs.

publications.name: Bitteiler: Demonstration of Efficient and Private Massive Industrial IoT Communications
publications.publisher: IEEE 19th Annual Consumer Communications & Networking Conference (CCNC)
publications.description: The increasingly difficult challenges in managing big data are inciting for revolutionary and fundamental techniques, as well as for technologies that can handle the complexity and the never-before-seen volume of data. Our goal is to enable high-density industrial networks to transmit and store production-related information efficiently and confidentially while retaining any existing network infrastructure. As the deployment of sensors leads to both the benefits and the challenges of industrial big data, our Bitteiler solution represents a means to reduce the data volume at the early stages of the data cycle to curb its impact on communications and storage systems. Bitteiler is a plug-and-play solution that allows customers to leverage smart IoT solutions to the fullest to achieve an industry 4.0-ready production process that is both efficient and secure. Our practical demonstration provides a hands-on experience with the Bitteiler technology – including in-network compression and coding – using a number of live IoT devices that can be manipulated by the audience.

data.description:
Breeze Technologies is a technology leader for air quality sensors, air quality data and air quality analytics software. The company leverages the internet of things and artificial intelligence to help cities and businesses create better clean air action plans and a more liveable environment.

Breeze Technologies was founded in 2015 and has been recognised as one of the most promising European startups by the European Parliament and the European Commission. Breeze's founders have been listed as Forbes 30 Under 30 and received numerous awards, including from the German Federal President.

data.summary:
Robert Heinecke is an entrepreneur, futurist thinker and smart city expert. He is the CEO of Breeze Technologies, a German industry leader in air quality sensors, data and analytics, which he co-founded in 2015. Before that, Robert worked for multiple international consultancies in strategy and digitalisation. He holds degrees in Computer Science and IT Management & Consulting. 
Robert is a "Forbes 30 Under 30 Europe" and "Capital 40 Under 40", a member of the European Commission's "Young Leaders of Industry" sustainability panel and member of the scientific advisory board of the Federal Association for Electric Mobility in Germany.
data.headline: Translate environmental data into action || CEO @ Breeze Technologies || Smart City Expert, Entrepreneur, Forbes 30 Under 30, 40U40 || Air quality sensors, air quality data & clean air action analytics

experience.description:
Breeze Technologies provides an environmental intelligence platform that offers hyperlocal, comprehensive and accurate air quality data, as well as insights and actionable recommendations.
Breeze's platform integrates a multitude of public and private air quality data sources, as well as the startup's own low-cost air quality sensors. 

The collected data is then aggregated and assimilated through different applications. Smart algorithms evaluate air quality in real time, suggest the most efficient and effective air quality improvement measures, connect customers to intervention partners and track the success of implemented and ongoing interventions for both smart buildings and cities.

Breeze's platform is deployed in Germany's two largest cities, Berlin and Hamburg, as well as in a growing number of international corporates including Otto and Deutsche Telekom.

The startup was founded in 2015 in Hamburg, Germany. It has been funded through two EU startup innovation programmes, a grant from the German Federal Ministry for Economic Affairs and Energy, as well as the Google DNI fund. The company has been recognised in multiple national and international competitions as one of the most promising European startups by the European Parliament and Commission, Germany - Land of Ideas (award from the German President) and Forbes 30 Under 30.

data.description:
brighter AI provides image & video anonymization solutions based on state-of- the-art deep learning technology. Our solutions, Precision Blur and Deep Natural Anonymization (DNAT), redact faces and license plates and help companies comply with data protection regulations such as the GDPR.

With our privacy technologies, we enable companies in various industries to use publicly-recorded camera data for analytics and AI. Our clients mitigate their liability and the risks of being fined, increase the capacity of their teams, improve their time to market, and push innovation. 

brighter AI was founded in 2017 as a spin-off of the German automotive supplier HELLA. Nvidia named brighter AI "Europe's Hottest AI Startup" in 2019, and in 2020 brighter AI won "The Spark - The German Digital Award" from Handelsblatt & McKinsey.

Learn more about us at: https://brighter.ai/

data.name: BRYTER
data.tagline: BRYTER is the AI and No-code Platform for Legal and Compliance.

localized.en_US: BRYTER is the AI and No-code Platform for Legal and Compliance.

data.description:
BRYTER is the AI and No-code Platform for Legal and Compliance.

BRYTER enables law firms and in-house legal and compliance teams to work more efficiently. 
By combining the power of AI with the precision of workflows, our two products — the BRYTER No-code Platform and AI Agents — improve productivity and make services accessible to business partners. 

Using our No-code Platform, legal and compliance professionals automate workflows — from document automation to signatory approvals. 

Using our AI Agents, teams can be more productive by automating everything from replying to commercial requests to completing infosec questionnaires. 

Global brands like McDonald’s and ING Bank, and law firms like Ashurst and Linklaters, use BRYTER every day to improve efficiencies and scale their services. 

BRYTER is a remote-first company with offices in New York, London and Frankfurt.

data.summary:
I am the Co-Founder & CEO of BRYTER, the leading no-code platform helping professional services to digitize and scale their knowledge.

With customers around the globe, BRYTER is one of the fastest growing enterprise automation platforms. Our intuitive toolbox enables experts in law, compliance finance and accounting to build, manage and distribute interactive applications, without the need for programming skills. 

I started my career as a lawyer in international litigation and arbitration but found my passion in building companies rather then consulting them. I founded the academic research platform and recruiting portal Thesius (sold to Persona Service AG in 2017) as well as the Legal Tech pioneer and automation specialist Lexalgo (acquired by BRYTER in 2018).

The business and the future of law and technology are my core topics of research, publication and speaking and I am grateful to contribute to the changing scene in our industry as a member to several institutions:
As a member of the legal think tank Bucerius Center on the Legal Profession (BCLP) at the Bucerius Law School, Hamburg, and to the Task Force Legal Tech of the Association of German Lawyers (DAV) e.V. I am researching and shaping the future of the legal market and profession in Europe.

Believing that everybody should be a teacher I lecture on Legal Tech and Innovation at the J.W. Goethe University Frankfurt.  

Please contact me if you are interested in decision automation, legal technology, enterprise SaaS and especially if you are interested in working with us.

data.tagline: CALLSTR ist Videoberatung über den Browser. Ohne Download. Ohne Anmeldung. Für alle Websites.

localized.en_US: CALLSTR ist Videoberatung über den Browser. Ohne Download. Ohne Anmeldung. Für alle Websites.
localized.de_DE: The video call solution for your website

data.description:
In einer zunehmend digitalen Welt bringen wir die Menschen wieder näher zueinander. Unser Videocall Tool ermöglicht eine zwischenmenschliche Interaktion im Verkauf, im Support, in der Schulung und weiteren Bereichen. 
Ob in der Apotheke oder im Blumenladen, wir sprechen gerne mit Menschen und lernen aus ihren Erfahrungen. Aber warum müssen wir dafür vor Ort sein?
Die Software lässt sich schnell und einfach in jede Website integrieren. Die Besucher der Website können über einen Button den Live Call starten.
Die Videoberatung sorgt für eine stärkere Kundenbindung, verringert Warenkorbabbrüche und erhöht die Conversion. Mithilfe der Kamera und der Screensharing-Funktion lassen sich beratungsintensive Produkte und Dienstleistungen schnell und anschaulich erklären. Wir schaffen ein nachhaltiges Konzept und bieten eine Lösung für die Problematik durch temporäre Schließungen im Lockdown.

The Global University Challenge is an open innovation project organized by Siemens Power & Gas, Siemens Digital Factory, Corporate Technology and Human Resources involving students of eight universities worldwide: RWTH Aachen, TU Berlin, University of Potsdam (Germany), IE Business School (Madrid, Spain), Georgia Institute of Technology, University of Central Florida (USA), Tsinghua University and Shanghai Jiao Tong University (China).

A key aspect in future industry is the availability of a digital representation of machines, components or manufacturing processes. That is the so called 'digital twin'. data.headline: Co-Founder at CarTrust (as a property company)

experience.description:
After we closed the vehicle business in early 2013; we took the decision to invest in commercial property, which we identified as offering value.

My role and responsibilities include the following: 
•	Identifying attractive locations, which have attractive growth prospects and are reasonably  priced, and sourcing properties to purchase in those areas.
•	Building a financial model to estimate the level of return to expect per property as well as to compare different properties under consideration from a financial perspective.
•	Assist in the negotiation of the purchase price by providing financial reasons to support our offer price.
•	Assisting in the due diligence process. 

Other projects I have been involved in this time include investing in a start-up as well as continuing to invest in equity markets around the world.
experience.title: Co-Founder

experience.description:
Our goal with CarTrust was to disrupt the used vehicle market in South Africa by launching an innovative car auction and retail start-up aimed at making the used car market in South Africa more efficient and transparent. CarTrust started out as a vehicle auction company with an online and physical retail presence; the idea being to get people to trust auctions (and what they bought at auctions) with various features such as independent vehicle checks, allowing test drives etc., which combined with minimum and transparent transaction costs and simple processes would build trust, drive volumes and build a market place for second hand vehicles. Unfortunately we underestimated how difficult it is to change consumer behavior and we were forced to alter the offering to a more traditional model. We then attempted to transition the business to a ‘car hypermarket’, similar to Car Giant in the UK, but we found that we had insufficient capital to invest into this initiative to make it a success and eventually made the decision to cut our losses.

As a co-founder I was involved in all aspects of the business. I have listed some of the main areas below:
•	Researching and developing the business plan including P&L and cash forecasts to determine if CarTrust was feasible and what investment was needed.
•	Jointly responsible for all strategy decisions. These included decisions on exactly what services we would provide; our pricing; our marketing strategy as well as how to execute these strategies. 
•	Designed and implemented the financial and physical control systems at the start of the business.
•	Coordinated the radio, internet, outdoor and print advertising campaign as well as assisted in the design and content of the CarTrust website.
•	Implemented the legal function.
experience.title: Co-Founder

experience.description:
My role and responsibilities included the following:
•	Responsible for the preparation of the three major sets of consolidated financial statements as well as being the main contact with the Auditors.									
•	Assisted with the implementation of Hyperion- an accounting consolidation system
•	Performed various period end procedures to ensure the management reporting packs were prepared accurately and that deadlines were met.
•	Trained and managed an outsourced employee who was based in India
•	Assisted with the budget and re-forecast process.

data.description:
You are a different breed of a company. Beyond your business, you are pursuing a wider cause. But today it is hard to stand out. 

With 9 years of expertise in engagement, Civocracy has build a unique branding method to support mission-driven companies in user acquisition and customer loyalty. 

With Civocracy, we work with Participative Campaigning, a branding method where we create momentum of your brand by setting up new and exciting yearly quests with your customers.

We use a two-phase approach:
- we don't create new stories, but work with your marketing department to build captivating quests for your audiences.

Join us to foster engagement in order to create meaningful change!

volunteer.description:
Trotz großer Anstrengungen und großer Heilungserfolge in den letzten Jahrzehnten stirbt immer noch jedes fünfte Kind mit einer bösartigen Erkrankung (z. B. Lymphdrüsenkrebs, Leukämie, Hirntumore). Diese unberechenbaren Krankheiten bei Kindern werden erst ihren Schrecken verlieren, wenn die Heilung die Regel und der Tod die absolute Ausnahme ist. Noch viel zu oft kämpfen die Ärzte vergeblich um das Leben ihrer kleinen Patienten und noch immer sind die psychischen Belastungen durch die Erkrankungen für die Kinder und ihre Familien sehr oft ebenso schwerwiegend wie das körperliche Leid. Die staatliche Finanzierung allein reicht hier nicht aus. Es wird mehr Geld benötigt, um die verstärkten Anstrengungen in der Kinderkrebsforschung zu unterstützen, um neue Behandlungskonzepte zu erarbeiten, sowie die pflegerische und psychosoziale Betreuung krebskranker Kinder zu verbessern. Für diese Ziele rollt die Hanse-Tour-Sonnenschein auch in diesem Jahr durch Mecklenburg-Vorpommern.
 
Unterstützen Sie uns im Kampf gegen Kinderkrebs mit einer Spende auf das Spendenkonto des Fördervereins Hanse-Tour-Sonnenschein e.V. oder senden Sie eine SMS mit „SONNE“ an die 8 11 90.

CoBenefit provides a digital team as a service, supporting strategic innovation projects in the renewable energy sector from conceptualisation and software development to market launch (lab to market). Our experienced team of developers in Kenya, alongside our on-site CPO and CTO in Germany, ensures the necessary speed to keep our projects ahead. We currently provide services exclusively for select projects on request.

We have founded two spin-off companies: OHKW Klimajobs and Shiftup. We also facilitate the transition to sustainability at industry level through our engagement in multi-stakeholder initiatives across Europe.
experience.title: CEO & Co-Founder

experience.description:
During the two years, I developed a range of sustainability criteria and a methodology to support architects in their decision-making. I applied this in a pilot project with the architecture firm Studio Hartzema. Moreover, I developed an online shop for used building materials and an MVP for an Autodesk Revit plug-in.

Our vision was a greener construction industry that exploits the benefits of the circular economy. Therefore, we helped architects and engineers to find suitable sustainable building materials for their projects. Unfortunately, our approach was not scalable at the time, which is why we ended the endeavour.

We completed the EIT Greenhouse 2019 as the best team, were 'Kraak de Crisis' finalists, and were part of KTH Innovation in Stockholm for over a year.
experience.title: Co-Founder & Product Lead

experience.description:
I was working with Vyer as part of an exchange with Erasmus for Young Entrepreneurs. A central topic during my time in Sweden was the development of Vyer’s pricing strategy. Therefore, I analyzed the competition, established a financial analysis of customer expenses with the help of a survey, and modeled customer break-even times. My financial projection for Vyer incorporated this data as well as growth assumptions. 

Furthermore, I helped to establish a marketing strategy with the primary objective to grow the brand awareness. Through evaluating the competition, I identified LinkedIn and Facebook as target channels for marketing. Marketing topics were collected and later tested through social media posts.
experience.title: Business Consultant

experience.description: For my master thesis, I was researching how building design and engineering companies like Arcadis can facilitate their Digital Transformation. Therefore, the operating principles for a Knowledge-Based System were developed to enable the (re)use of the knowledge stored in Building Information Models (BIM) models of previous and ongoing projects. Subsequently, the transforming effects such a system would have and connected issues were addressed. A key implication of my thesis was that Knowledge Management should be an integral part of a company's digital strategy.
experience.title: Graduate Research Intern

education.description:
Through my studies, I have a strong background on sustainable business model innovation and change management – thus, in identifying drivers and barriers of innovation and sustainability, in the evaluation of technological, managerial and organizational alternatives, and in the development of strategies to overcome those barriers. 

Relevant coursework: Change Management, International Strategic Management, Technology Related Venturing.

Alumni EIT Climate-KIC Master Label.

Thesis: "Facilitating the Digital Transformation of Building Design and Engineering Companies by Transferring Knowledge across Projects"

I participated in the KTH Innovation pre-incubator program for 15 months. At the co-working space on the KTH campus, I develop side by side with others working to bring their own projects to life. Every week, we took part in our tailor made workshop program and were mentored in personal meetings by some of Swedens' top business mentors.

The Climate-KIC Journey Summer School is the world’s largest climate innovation summer school. During the intensive 5-week program, we were working on our own business ideas to help fight climate change. Besides ETH Zurich where we had the core of our entrepreneurship education in Design Thinking, market research, financing and pitch training, Sorbonne University Paris and Montanuniversität Leoben were two other top universities hosting us.

My team was the winner of an award with our start-up idea “CrashNew”. CrashNew is a smart online tool for project developers to construct new sustainable buildings with materials from buildings soon to be demolished.

volunteer.role: Webmaster & Media Advisor of Historical Society
volunteer.description:
We are committed to the preservation of local cultural assets and customs as well as important buildings, monuments, contemporary documents and exhibits. 

I created the whole website of the society which has over 1000 monthly users. For them, I update the website with new content every week. Therefore, I also custom-design and implement sub-pages for new topics. Furthermore, I am providing technical support for the different ongoing projects, prepare the graphics, explain the results of web analytics and give advise on the social media strategy. 

I was honored by the mayor for my commitment and was a candidate for the award 'Landespreis Heimatforschung Digital 2021'.

Visit us: www.heimatverein-ubstadt-weiher.de

volunteer.role: Social Media Manager of Citizens' Initiative
volunteer.description:
The 'Waldwichtel' makes the surrounding fields and woods of Weiher (Ubstadt-Weiher, Germany) more exciting for children. Therefore, the citizens' initiative writes stories and riddles along with lovingly illustrates drawings. This alternating material is put up on various locations in the surrounding area. There, the children are called to participate in thematic activities.

I help to inform the parents about new stories and activities online. Through a QR code that is attached to each story, people can go to our website to view all story locations and activities. They are asked to follow on social media to stay up to date on new activities. The website and social media accounts were created and are managed by me.

Visit us: www.waldwichtel.org

I was in charge of the supervision during the high season – on some days with far over a thousand visitors. I was also the contact person for visitors and responsible for the allocation and management of camping plots.

data.summary:
🌱 Advancing the GovTech sector for a sustainable future 
🚀 Advocating female entrepreneurship & leadership

Hi, I'm Katharina and I bring over a decade of experience in strategic consulting and a deep passion for sustainability and innovation to the table. My academic journey led me to a captivating PhD in political sciences, where I explored female political leadership and its contribution to sustainable development via political innovations. This journey finally led me to founding comuneo, where we're dedicated to bringing sustainability and innovation to the public sector. Our vision is to become the data-based navigation system guiding the public sector towards a more sustainable future – enhancing the quality of life for as many people as possible whilst equally protecting the planet. Our SaaS solution empowers public administrations to use data to measure, monitor, manage, and communicate their sustainable development efforts.

---

🌱 GovTech für eine nachhaltige Zukunft
🚀 Female Entrepreneurship & Leadership

Hallo, ich bin Katharina, und ich bringe über ein Jahrzehnt Erfahrung in der strategischen Beratung und große Leidenschaft für Nachhaltigkeit und Innovationen mit. Meine Reise führte mich vor einiger Zeit zu einer Promotion in Politikwissenschaften, in der ich weibliche politische Führungskräfte und ihren Beitrag zur nachhaltigen Entwicklung durch politische Innovationen erforschte. Die Forschungserkenntnisse inspirierten mich schließlich zur Gründung von comuneo, einem Unternehmen mit dem wir nachhaltige Entwicklung und Innovation im öffentlichen Sektor vorantreiben wollen. Unsere Vision ist es, das datenbasierte Navigationssystem des öffentlichen Sektors auf dem Weg zu einer nachhaltigeren Zukunft zu werden. Dabei wollen wir die Lebensqualität von möglichst vielen Menschen verbessern und gleichzeitig den Planeten schützen. Zu diesem Zweck haben wir eine SaaS-Lösung entwickelt, die es öffentlichen Verwaltungen ermöglicht, ihre Nachhaltigkeitsbestrebungen mithilfe von Daten zu messen, zu überwachen, zu verwalten und zu kommunizieren.

data.name: constellr
data.tagline: Temperature from space for food security on Earth.​

localized.de_DE: Temperature from space for food security on Earth.​

data.description: At constellr, we support food security by enabling high-precision smart farming services across the globe. Using proprietary space infrastructure, constellr leads the way in measuring water, temperature, and carbon to assess vegetation and soil health at an unprecedented level. Our vision is to bring accountability to tackling climate change.

data.summary:
Temperature for plant health assessment!

We will need 50% more food by 2050 to feed roughly 10 B people on this planet. How can we hope to achieve this without more agricultural area, with increasing water scarcity, increased risk of droughts and under changing climatic conditions?

This is a global challenge which affects all of us. To manage these challenges we need a monitoring system which measures crop health precisely and on time on a global scale. 

Land Surface Temperature (LST) enable timely & efficient water management by deriving Evapotranspiration (ET). 

LST based analysis allows to detect water stress days to weeks earlier than current methods. With no doubt, vegetation indices like the NDVI are a great way to assess crop health. However, in some cases LST provides, besides an earlier warning indication, also a more accurate result when assessing water stress & crop health.

Combining currents methods with precise and accurate LST will accelerate remote sensing based analytics models to provide key insights of the crops on time, robust and worldwide.

I invite you to get in touch with me to join our journey and face the challenges of our time heads on.

(A) The development of noninvasive methodologies for the observation of complex transient phenomena. Main focus: Development of ultrafast low-energy electron diffraction
Concepts & methods: Simulation of (electron) optical systems via FEM; concept, CAD-based design and construction of a new experimental apparatus; maintenance of a complex laser system; the combination of know-how in chemistry, theoretical and experimental physics for experimental analysis
Driven by the continuous miniaturization of components in current electronics- and chemistry-based applications, the ratio of surface and interface area with respect to encapsulated volume constantly rise. However, this trend is only partially supported in terms of characterization methods, which enable us to follow physical or chemical processes on their respective spatial and temporal time scales. In order to close this gap in instrumentation, we developed ultrafast low-energy electron diffraction, which allows for monolayer-sensitive analysis of surfaces and thin films with nanometer spatial as well as few-picosecond temporal resolution.
In particular, we resolved the melting dynamics of a quasi-two-dimensional system of a polymer adsorbed on free-standing graphene. Major findings included a detailed account of the structural properties with hints of a 2D-crystalline phase, and, more generally, a drastically different behaviour of the two-dimensional system with respect to its bulk counterpart.

publications.name: Robust optical tracking of individual ejecta particles in hypervelocity impact experiments
publications.description: New insights into the kinematics of ejecta clouds and the dynamics of crater formation are gained from the introduction of an approach to track individual particles ejected from a horizontal hypervelocity impact of a 2 mm aluminum sphere at 6.3 km s−1 into vertically aligned Carrara marble. Particle trajectories are determined with 500 ns temporal resolution inside a 1–2 mm thick laser light sheet illuminating a single plane within the ejecta plume. In contrast to optical flow analysis, the methodology presented here enables us to track individual particles instead of relying on field-averaged information. This is realized by correlating particles not via their geometric shape but through their trajectory directly. It robustly identifies even partially obscured or strongly tumbling particles, allowing for a comprehensive physical description of the highly dynamical excavation process based on the precise determination of position, time, and ejection velocity of each individual particle. Specifically, we find ejecta particles launched in a short window of about 0–25 μs after impact and up to a radial distance of 10 mm from the impact location. During this time interval, the transient crater radius grows from 2 ± 1 mm to 6 ± 2 mm. Velocities between 70 m s−1 and 1 km s−1 are observed and reveal a substantial steepening of the ejecta curtain within 15 μs after the impact. We additionally determine the particle size and find a μ-parameter of 0.6 for Carrara marble which is consistent with theoretical predictions for nonporous materials.

publications.name: Dynamics and Structure of Monolayer Polymer Crystallites on Graphene
publications.description: Graphene-based nanostructured systems and van der Waals heterostructures comprise a material class of growing technological and scientific importance. Joining materials with vastly different properties, polymer/graphene heterosystems promise diverse applications in surface and nanotechnology, including photovoltaics or nanotribology. Fundamentally, molecular adsorbates are prototypical systems to study confinement-induced phase transitions exhibiting intricate dynamics, which require a comprehensive understanding of the dynamical and static properties on molecular time and length scales. Here, we investigate the dynamics and the structure of a single polyethylene chain on free-standing graphene by means of molecular dynamics simulations. In equilibrium, the adsorbed polymer is orientationally linked to the graphene as two-dimensional folded-chain crystallite or at elevated temperatures as a floating solid. The associated superstructure can be reversibly melted on a picosecond time scale upon quasi-instantaneous substrate heating, involving ultrafast heterogeneous melting via a transient floating phase. Our findings elucidate time-resolved molecular-scale ordering and disordering phenomena in individual polymers interacting with solids, yielding complementary information to collective friction and viscosity, and linking to recent experimental observables from ultrafast electron diffraction. We anticipate that the approach will help in resolving nonequilibrium phenomena of hybrid polymeric systems over a broad range of time and length scales.

member.occupation: Co-Founder and CEO at constellr

publications.name: Ultrafast low-energy electron diffraction in transmission resolves polymer/graphene superstructure dynamics
publications.description: Two-dimensional systems such as surfaces and molecular monolayers exhibit a multitude of intriguing phases and complex transitions. Ultrafast structural probing of such systems offers direct time-domain information on internal interactions and couplings to a substrate or bulk support. We have developed ultrafast low-energy electron diffraction and investigate in transmission the structural relaxation in a polymer/graphene bilayer system excited out of equilibrium. The laser-pump/electron-probe scheme resolves the ultrafast melting of a polymer superstructure consisting of folded-chain crystals registered to a free-standing graphene substrate. We extract the time scales of energy transfer across the bilayer interface, the loss of superstructure order, and the appearance of an amorphous phase with short-range correlations. The high surface sensitivity makes this experimental approach suitable for numerous problems in ultrafast surface science.

publications.name: Coherent femtosecond low-energy single-electron pulses for time-resolved diraction and imaging: A numerical study
publications.description: We numerically investigate the properties of coherent femtosecond single electron wave packets photoemitted from nanotips in view of their application in ultrafast electron diffraction and non-destructive imaging with low-energy electrons. For two different geometries, we analyze the temporal and spatial broadening during propagation from the needle emitter to an anode, identifying the experimental parameters and challenges for realizing femtosecond time resolution. The simple tip-anode geometry is most versatile and allows for electron pulses of several ten of femtosecond duration using a very compact experimental design, however, providing very limited control over the electron beam collimation. A more sophisticated geometry comprising a suppressor-extractor electrostatic unit and a lens, similar to typical field emission electron microscope optics, is also investigated, allowing full control over the beam parameters. Using such a design, we find ∼230 fs pulses feasible in a focused electron beam. The main limitation to achieve sub-hundred femtosecond time resolution is the typical size of such a device, and we suggest the implementation of more compact electron optics for optimal performance.
